headline: Anna Paulina Luna announces $400K in Q1 fundraising for CD 13 race
sentences: “The campaign’s continued fundraising strength underscores Luna’s momentum in the first quarter of the election year, in which she also announced multiple high-profile endorsements from House GOP leaders including Conference Chair Elise Stefanik, Rep. Jim Jordan, and others,” her campaign said in a fundraising email.

“In addition to strong fundraising and broad support, polling confirms Luna’s status as the far-and-away Republican frontrunner to flip this top (National Republican Congressional Committee) targeted seat in November.”
The CD 13 race is one of the most contentious and closely watched of the 2022 midterms.
An Air Force veteran, Luna’s campaign this cycle has featured allegations of a murder-for-hire plot against her and accusations (which Luna denied) that one of her aides attacked Henson’s fiance.
Anna Paulina Luna, a GOP candidate for the race in Florida’s 13th Congressional District, announced Friday that her campaign raised more than $400,000 in the first quarter of 2022.
According to an October survey on GOP Primary candidates from St. Pete Polls, Luna, who won the Republican Primary for CD 13 last year against Makki, had 38% support.
He was listed as “campaign staff” with Luna’s 2020 General Election campaign, according to FEC records from her run against incumbent Crist two years ago.
That means she has raised nearly $1.5 million in the race to replace outgoing U.S. Rep. Charlie Crist as he runs for Governor.
But when asked who they would vote for if the election were right now, more than 52% of voters were undecided.
Reports aren’t due until April 15, but candidates are free to release their own information at any time.
Democrat Ben Diamond ended 2021 just under a million, but announced in January he’d hit seven figures.
Republican Amanda Makki finished with $541,000 and Democrat Michele Rayner brought in $334,000.
In December, Makki won the Conservative Grounds straw poll, which Luna had won the year prior.
The individual involved in the incident — Gage Huber — is not part of Luna’s current campaign.
Luna closed out 2021 leading both sides of the field with just over a million dollars raised.
The CD 13 race is one of the most contentious and closely watched of the 2022 midterms.
Friday afternoon, Luna was the first CD 13 candidate to release fundraising numbers.
None of the other candidates, including Makki, even broke double-digit support.
Luna, who also touts a Donald Trump endorsement, lost the 2022 race to Crist.
Quarterly campaign fundraising in congressional races closed Thursday.
Democrat Eric Lynn ended 2021 adding nearly $900,000 overall.
However, he is not tied to her current Primary Election run.
The rest of the candidates have raised less than $20,000.
Republican Audrey Henson raised $306,000.
